resources.string:
Here are some guidelines to follow for using our app safely:

 • Always keep your emergency contacts updated.

 • Make sure your GPS location is enabled for accurate tracking.

 • Familiarize yourself with the panic button feature and how to use it in an emergency.

 • Review the safety tips provided in the app regularly.

 If you feel unsafe, don't hesitate to reach out to your emergency contacts or local authorities.

 • Report any issues or concerns to our support team immediately.

 Stay safe and use the app responsibly!


National Commission for Women (NCW) Helpline: 011-26942369, 011-26944754

 All India Women's Conference (AIWC) Helpline: 011-24123164, 011-24124305

 Women Helpline (Domestic Abuse): 181
